verses.t: Paul{G3972}, and{G2532} Silvanus{G4610}, and{G2532} Timotheus{G5095}, unto the church{G3588} of the Thessalonians{G2331} in{G1722} God{G2316} our{G2257} Father{G3962} and{G2532} the Lord{G2962} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}:

Which is a manifest token{G1730} of the righteous{G1342} judgment{G2920} of God{G3588}, that{G1519} ye{G5209} may be counted worthy{G2661} of the kingdom{G3588}of God{G3588}, for{G5228} which{G3739} ye{G3958} also{G2532} suffer{G3958}:

And{G2532} to you{G5213} who are troubled{G2346} rest{G425} with{G3326} us{G2257}, when{G1722} the Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} shall be revealed{G3588} from{G575} heaven{G3772} with{G3326} his{G846} mighty{G1411} angels{G32},

When{G3752} he shall come{G2064} to be glorified{G1740} in{G1722} his{G846} saints{G40}, and{G2532} to be admired{G2296} in{G1722} all{G3956} them that believe{G4100} (because{G3754} our{G2257} testimony{G3588} among{G1909} you{G5209} was believed{G4100}) in{G1722} that{G1565} day{G3588}.

This was the best solution I could think of.

That{G3704} the name{G3588} of our{G2257} Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547} may be glorified{G1740} in{G1722} you{G5213}, and{G2532} ye{G5210} in{G1722} him{G846}, according to{G2596} the grace{G3588} of our{G2257} God{G3588} and{G2532} the Lord{G2962} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}.
